text: Curt Lowens (17 November 1925 - 8 May 2017) was an American actor of the stage and in feature movies and television, as well as a Holocaust survivor and a rescuer who saved about 150 Jewish children during the Holocaust. He was known for his roles as Director Swift in Werewolf in a Girls' Dormitory (1962) and as a Soviet ambassador on The A-Team, appearing from 1983 through 1987. He was also in Angels & Demons.
